tasks.Description: 1. Implement user authentication system. 2. Set up user roles and permissions. 3. Ensure secure login and data protection.
1. Design user interface for the dashboard. 2. Implement interactive elements. 3. Integrate data visualization tools.
1. Create a database for products. 2. Develop product listing and categorization features. 3. Implement search and filtering options.
1. Build a cart system for users. 2. Allow addition, removal, and quantity adjustment of items. 3. Ensure cart persistence.
1. Implement checkout process. 2. Integrate payment gateways securely. 3. Ensure transaction completion and order confirmation.
1. Develop an admin interface. 2. Provide tools for managing users, products, and orders. 3. Ensure admin role-based access.
1. Create user profile pages. 2. Display order history and details. 3. Allow profile customization options.
1. Set up email notification system. 2. Implement triggers for order updates and account-related notifications.
1. Conduct security audit. 2. Implement additional security measures. 3. Ensure protection against common threats.
1. Analyze and optimize code for performance. 2. Conduct thorough testing across different scenarios and devices.
